It also has a category which is âAttractionsâ that tells you the ten best places to visit when you are in Miami.Miami has so much to offer when it comes to entertainment and joy of the tourists. MiamiâWorld famous for its Exotic Beaches, Hotels & Resorts, Restaurants, Shopping Malls, and many moreâgives the unforgettable experience of lifetime.Key Features:â¢Eight well-researched categoriesâ¢Categories include: Hotels & Resorts, Beaches, Nightlife, and moreâ¢Exact location, image, and description for the desired destinationâ¢Integrated âGoogle Mapâ for locationsâ¢Integrated âGoogle Weatherâ for locationsâ¢Share with friends/family via Facebook, Twitter or MailDonât forget to rate the application; as your reviews are going to be highly appreciated and would encourage us to update and work further more on these applications.
